subject: Junit4 new features ?
msgSnippet: Hi - Is there any plan in the near future to support some TestNG features like: 1) Ability to re-run only the failed tests by storing the list of failed tests
messageBody:
Hi -

Is there any plan in the near future to support some TestNG features like:

1) Ability to re-run only the failed tests by storing the list of
failed tests persistently in an XML file etc. I have thought through a
patch to Junit to address this. Would there be any interest in using
this patch?

2) Allow non-static Before|After Class methods?

3) Support dependsOnMethods annotation like TestNG ?
